command-line: python run.py CYTOMINE_HOST CYTOMINE_PUBLIC_KEY CYTOMINE_PRIVATE_KEY CYTOMINE_ID_PROJECT CYTOMINE_ID_SOFTWARE CYTOMINE_ID_IMAGES CYTOMINE_ID_TERMS CYTOMINE_ID_USERS CYTOMINE_ID_PROJECTS CYTOMINE_REVIEWED CYTOMINE_ZOOM_LEVEL CYTOMINE_POSITIVE_TERMS CYTOMINE_BINARY N_JOBS NETWORK CLASSIFIER CV_FOLDS RANDOM_SEED

inputs.name: Cytomine ids images
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of images whose the annotations should be selected for training.

inputs.name: Cytomine ids terms
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of terms of which the annotations should be selected for training.

inputs.name: Cytomine ids users
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of users whose the annotations should be selected for training.

inputs.name: Cytomine ids projects
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of projects of which the annotations should be selected for training.

inputs.name: Cytomine reviewed
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) '0' for using regular annotations. '1' for also including reviewed annotations. '2' for using only reviewed annotations.

inputs.name: Zoom level
inputs.description: The zoom level at which the algorithm should work.

inputs.name: Zoom level
inputs.description: List of terms that should be considered as positive in a binary problem (ignored if binary is false)

inputs.name: Cytomine binary
inputs.description: Whether or not to treat the problem as a binary classification problem

inputs.name: Network
inputs.description: Name identifier of the network among: 'resnet' and 'densenet'

inputs.name: Classifier
inputs.description: The classifier to use for classifying the features among: 'svm'

inputs.name: Cross-validation folds
inputs.description: Number of folds for cross validation. Can be adjusted according to data distribution.

name: Classify-DL-SVMFeat-Train
description: Cytomine software for image classification with deep features (model training)
